kya-analytics.name: KYA-Analytics
kya-analytics.description: Analyze your data in real-time and make informed decisions.

kya-control.name: KYA-Control

monitoring.title: Real-time Monitoring
monitoring.description: Monitor your PV solar installations with precise and up-to-date data.

management.title: Load Management
management.description: Prioritize device power and optimize energy distribution.

reporting.title: Smart Reports
reporting.description: Generate clear, detailed reports to analyze your performance.

alerts.title: Alerts & Notifications
alerts.description: Receive automatic alerts in case of anomalies or critical thresholds.

collaboration.title: Secure Collaboration
collaboration.description: Share software access with your team and partners safely.

integration.title: External Data Integration
integration.description: Connect your KYA software with other data sources (files, sensors, etc.).

customization.title: Advanced Customization
customization.description: Adjust dashboards and themes for an experience tailored to your needs.

export.title: Multi-format Export
export.description: Export your data in PDF, Excel, or CSV for analysis or presentations.

user1.title: Product Manager at KSA
user1.text: With KYA-FlexyControl, managing our solar installations is easier: real-time monitoring and automatic alerts improve our efficiency.

user2.title: Energy Project Manager, France
user2.text: The reporting tool is incredibly powerful. It helped us reduce report creation time by 50% and improved communication with our clients.

user3.title: Technical Director, Germany
user3.text: Dashboard customization is a real advantage. Every team member has a view suited to their needs, which optimizes daily operations.

Footer.description: Your partner for a sustainable and responsible energy transition.
